controller.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.player.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TurnListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputerPlayer, LocalPlayer, NetworkPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements TurnListener
    Abstract class representing players.
    Author:
    Stanislav Smatana

      • eventTurn

        public void eventTurn(Turn t)
        Method to react to turnEvent from GUI. Defined as blank in abstract class because not all players need to talk with gui.
        Specified by:
        eventTurn in interface TurnListener

      • end

        public void end()
        Method notifies player that game has ended. In most cases should be empty. Only network player needs additional cleanup.

      • turnNotify

        public abstract void turnNotify(Turn t)
        Method notifies player, that it is his turn
